general_advisory: Go for the sowing of pre-rabi crops like blackgram, greengram, horsegram... Keep the banana garden neat and clean.

advisory: If population of Brown Plant Hopper (BPH) exceeds economic threshold level (ETL) (i.e., 5-10 hoppers/hill), alter the micro-climate of the rice field by alternate wetting and drying technique.
To control leaf webber in Arhar spray Chloropyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5% EC.
Drench the seed bed with streptocycline 0.1g with carbendazim 1g mixing in one litrer water to protect seedlings from damping off.
To manage sucking pest like aphids, Jassids, thrips and whiteflies in Okra spray neem-based pesticide.
Apply urea and MOP per acre after hoeing and hand weeding.
Start nursery preparation and sowing cabbage seeds.
Complete nursery preparation for sowing onion and sowing seeds in nursery.
After rainfall, uproot affected plants and destroy them away from the field.
To manage stem weevil, install Cosmolure pheromone traps in banana garden.
To manage mealy bug at early stage of infestation spray neem-based pesticide.
To manage fruit fly in cucurbits, prepare a poison bait by mixing Jaggery and Malathion in water.
If your domestic animal shows signs of parasitic infestation, make fecal sample examination at regular intervals.
